main event: Observers from an industrial plant near Chatham, Ontario, Canada have been seeing a bright, glowing object hovering in the horizon over the past two weeks.
interesting points: The object appeared to be approximately 40 feet in diameter.
The object was observed hovering and moving up and down, disappearing and reappearing between the hours of 1900 and 2200 each evening.
Multiple individuals from the industrial plant positively observed the object.
The object had a bright light with a touch of red and appeared to be glowing.
The Air Force was contacted by the local newspaper, the Chatham Daily News, regarding the sighting.
sighted object: a bright, glowing object approximately 40 feet in diameter
witnesses: multiple individuals from an industrial plant
